Module com.example.froggeroop
Package com.example.froggeroop.terrain

Class Road

java.lang.Object
com.example.froggeroop.terrain.Road
public class Road extends Object
A Road characterize all the lanes on which the player can moves. It contains a WindowList object to manage the set of visible lanes over the set of all lanes.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors

    Description
    Road()
    Constructor of the class, actually calls the reset method

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    addLane()
    Add a new lane to the road, depending on the number of lanes, will add a WaterLane or a DrivableLane so that a block of 4 WaterLane directly follows a block of 4 DrivableLane Consecutive WaterLanes always face different directions

      public void addLane()
      Add a new lane to the road, depending on the number of lanes, will add a WaterLane or a DrivableLane so that a block of 4 WaterLane directly follows a block of 4 DrivableLane Consecutive WaterLanes always face different directions
